title: Relates to certain assessment methods and standards
summary: Relates to certain assessment methods and standards; provides that in no instance shall any portion or segment of parcels in each assessing unit be assessed separately from any other portion or segment of parcels located within the same assessing unit for use on an assessment roll for a particular taxable status year.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to certain assessment methods and standards
